duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide in-home, ABA-based therapy sessions to children on the autism spectrum.
Work with families to facilitate behavioral health interventions and support children with special needs.
Complete administrative work related to therapy sessions and client progress.
Participate in ongoing training and supervision to enhance skills in Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA).
Adhere to schedules and conduct home visits efficiently, ensuring the safety and well-being of participants.

education_certification.credential: Preferred completion of some college coursework or enrollment at an accredited college, with a focus on early childhood education, psychology, nursing, or a related field.
